title: Nine Inch Nails - Ghosts III-IV 5.1 (pt.2) DVD
description:
Nine Inch Nails
? Ghosts III-IV ? 5.1 (part two of two DVD set)

DVD authoring, design, and all surround sound mix was done by Erik Macedo. 

Recording credits are included, but please visit http://ghosts.nin.com/ for official information regarding the album.
CC INFORMATION: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/us/

Original photography by Marius Andrei Dima (MAD) and Erik Macedo. (Some photography shot by family members, as well.)

Marius was kind enough to provide full resolution photography and DVD covers for both DVD?s!
All the *official* artwork is included in this download.

Three Menus
-Play Ghosts III-IV
-Song Selection
-Credits
